left.name: Online Lab Service Management-JAVA
left.descr: A web application developed using JSP and servlet used to manage labs,schedule appointments and other various role dependent operations.

left.name: MedHelp
left.descr: An application to search an appropriate medicine. Used GWT, JAVA and NoSQL to develop it. Elastic Search is implemented to give the most appropriate and frequently used medicines.

right.name: Bank Registration System
right.descr: A database management system made using JDBC and SQL.
